{{Structure info}}
This village spawns in the [[plains]] biomes.

[[Hay bale]]s can spawn as clusters of around 8 blocks in multiple locations.

[[Mossy cobblestone]] sporadically replaces [[cobblestone]] when naturally generated, with abandoned villages having an increased likelihood of it happening.
